Aleksei Petukhov

Hamilton, New Zealand aleksei.petukhov.nz@gmail.com

Passionate Software Test Engineer with 4+ years of experience and a strong computer science background. Thrives on helping businesses deliver high-quality products through manual and automation testing. Streamlined automation for web applications, significantly reducing testing time and saving resources in a previous role. Automated nearly half of end-to-end tests in the current project, ensuring a smoother development process for the team. Fast learner who embraces Agile environments and enjoys collaboration to achieve shared goals. 10+ years of transferable experience brings a unique perspective to your senior testing team.

Experience

Software Engineer

CTEK

Test Strategy and Planning. Conducted broad testing (regression, user acceptance, functional, non-functional, security) and automated E2E tests using Cypress. Managed CI/CD with GitLab, performed API testing & UI(Angular)/Backend(DB), load and performance testing. Handled the defect management process using YouTrack in Agile (Scrum, Kanban) environment. Utilized various tools and technologies (Linux, Windows, GitLab, Postman, Docker, PostgreSQL, Kafdrop, Grafana etc.) and mastered tech stacks (Cypress, REST, gRPC, C#, JS).

July 2022 - Present

Intermediate QA Tester

OTR

Designed test cases, conducted functional testing, documented testing processes, performed verification/validation/beta testing, populated databases (PostgreSQL) and evaluated outputs. Reported bugs using JIRA/Confluence & collaborated with various teams. Played a key role in mobile team formation, addressing critical issues and creating test reports in a Kanban workflow. Shared knowledge with colleagues.

June 2021 - February 2022

Junior Software Testerr

Yandex

Executed over 2000 manual tests for new products/releases. Analyzed software documentation, conducted blackbox DB/UI testing across Dev/Test/Prod environments, documented & reported bugs, and efficiently tracked/managed them.

April 2021 - December 2021

Application Tester (Freelance)

WebTest.Club, Tester Work

Performed various testing types (smoke, functional, language, unit, stress, usability, performance). Reported & documented bugs, provided comprehensive descriptions of application behavior.

January 2020 - December 2021

Interests

Apart from being a tester, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. Here in New Zealand, I enjoy mountain hiking, car trips, and camping.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements.
